review: Have Visited Doctor Prarthana for Root Canal treatment and my root canal treatment was totally painfree..Dr.Prarthana is very caring and is very compassionate..She makes sure patient is made to understand entire procedure of root canal before starting it,that totally eliminates the fear..Forever Smiles Dental clinic is very neat and clean and staff is also very cooperative and well trained.. Would definetly recommend all my family and friends at Forever Smiles Dental Clinic for all dental needs..
